medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain started yesterday at 10:30 AM as constant supra-umbilical pain, which later developed associated nausea and dry-heaving. At 1:00 AM today, the pain migrated to the right lower quadrant (RLQ). The patient also reports chills and loose stools for one day, but no fevers. Symptoms have not previously been reported.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Depression, anxiety; previous surgery for wisdom tooth removal.
medical_history.family_history: No inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) or cancers. Father has a history of recent total pancreatectomy for unspecified pancreatitis.
